item.title: QAD INC 10-K
item.description: QAD INC, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 13, 2021 had 34846 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: million - 322 instances revenue - 320 instances company - 318 instances fiscal - 315 instances 2021 - 293 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
